expo.name: SOS ePCR
expo.description: Emergency Patient Care Reporting (ePCR) system for medical professionals to document patient care, vital signs, and emergency medical incidents.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs camera access to capture photos for patient care reports and documentation.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs microphone access to record voice notes for patient care documentation.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs location access to record incident locations for emergency medical reports.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs photo library access to attach images to patient care reports.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app may need contact access to link patient information with emergency contacts.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app may access health data to record vital signs and medical information for patient care reports.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app may update health data to record vital signs and medical information for patient care reports.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This app does not track users across other companies' apps or websites for advertising or sharing with data brokers.

en.name: SOS ePCR
en.description: Emergency Patient Care Reporting (ePCR) system for medical professionals to document patient care, vital signs, and emergency medical incidents.
